website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for use with exercises including controlled, fluid motion.
pros: Comfortable, durable neoprene exterior, reinforced stitching and sturdy outer trim.Comes in a variety of colors and weights
Designed with 5 external pockets, removable iron sand weights for adjustment from 2 to 10 lbs for each side
Smaller customers may find these too large to use as wrist weights

customer_reviews.title: quality is great! 6lbs..
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I am looking for..easy to use.fit is perfect..
customer_reviews.author: ElizaBeads

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I needed these to continue physical therapy exercises. As a senior citizen, almost 80, it took some getting used to, "wearing" weights"! They have been a great asset to my recovery however. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Greenvalleylady

customer_reviews.title: Strap is too short for male ankle, it's unclear that weight varies with color
customer_reviews.text: It may not be clear from the Amazon listing, but the weight of these straps vary by color. The grey straps are only 1 lb. I ended up with those more or less by mistake, 1 lb is pretty light. The velcro strap isn't sized for the average US male. It requires a quite slender ankle for the velcro hooks to line up with the felt. I'm 5"11, 170lbs, relatively slender and the velcro doesn't reach properly. They do work for straight leg raises while driving (cruise, nobody around, practiced braking) and working at a desk. If they straps were longer I'd buy another pair at a higher weight.
customer_reviews.author: John Faughnan

customer_reviews.title: Questionable design
customer_reviews.text: I found it taking me much more time for strapping over my shoe / ankle and then painfully inconvenient. It does the work providing load and resistance but I have suffered pain after each training sessions. It feels cheap. While better products use several small 20 0.5lb weights, which comfortably wrap around the ankle, this product is using only 5 2lb weights each, which create uneven load and doesn't sit well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Milbar

customer_reviews.title: because the workout I received on only a 2-mile walk was wonderful! The problem that I experienced was the Velcro ...
customer_reviews.text: I wished these had worked out, because the workout I received on only a 2-mile walk was wonderful! The problem that I experienced was the Velcro fastening strap was frayed when I was done with my walk. Also, the gray material that makes contact with my leg started wearing as well. I'm not impressed with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maridyth N.

customer_reviews.title: Waste off money
customer_reviews.text: Started breaking the second day of use and the stuff inside is falling out
customer_reviews.author: Brian Koeper

customer_reviews.title: One very pleased and humbled customer!
customer_reviews.text: I want to give the highest rating here...I mistakenly ordered what I thought were going to be 5 lb ankle weights, but instead, my mistake, ordered the 1 lb instead. When I asked for a refund for MY MISTAKE, they refunded me all my money and said that I didn't need to return the order. Now that is over and beyond excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great For Exercise And Recording
customer_reviews.text: These seem perfectly fine as weight training equipment, but I actually am getting great use out of them as counterweights for the boom arm of a microphone stand. The Samson MB1 ( is sturdy for its small size, but it's not quite enough to handle the Blue Yeti. However, I applied one 3lb weight to the boom arm and one 3lb weight to the base, and now it's more than stable enough to handle the Yeti with pop screen. The only downside is that they're not quite small enough for the poles in the mic stand, so they hang a little loosely. As long as you're not thrashing your equipment around, though, it's totally fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest 10 pounder I could find. Here's a tip: buy small ziplock bag and put the sandbags in them. It will decrease the chances of it ripping and leaking powder everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent, got a kettle bell instead. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Turns out that they sent me a kettle bell not wrist weights. I didn’t return it. Turns out I love doing kettle bell swings, snatches and Turkish gets-ups. I’ve been needing a kettle bell! So I cannot actually rate their wrist weights but the kettle bell is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: sistrgoldenhair

customer_reviews.title: Too loose
customer_reviews.text: The strap of these just barely aren't tight enough for my ankles I gotta fold over the ends on top if eachother and cinch it as tight as I can to keep them from sliding around... I'm disappointed. If the width of the sandbags was condensed down this wouldn't be a problem. I'm sure they would be fine for a man with larger legs, but seems to me they'd be using heavier weights...
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Big bulky and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write my review till I tried these things out for a while, and I’ve concluded they’re awful. Velcro straps are flimsy and the weighs are so bulky and way uncomfortable. I can see how these would be amazing but, unfortunately not in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for quality
customer_reviews.text: The black weights are rather flawed. The problems: (i) black sand leaks out of the weights onto every surface where they are placed, and (2) the Velcro straps slip, leaving you with an improperly secured weight that is drooping onto your foot. I have to store them in a bucket to save the carpet, but now that I know how many pounds they are, I plan to just replace them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Heyward

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to do some home therapy after knee surgery. My physical therapist uses ankle weights during my sessions and showed me the exercises to do at home. They do not go on as easily and they are very big and don't fit tightly at all. They are always sliding up and down during the exercise . Very clumsy and straps are awkward.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA CLAYTON

customer_reviews.title: she wear's this everyday and she says she feel like it's improving somehow
customer_reviews.text: Run forest run, or in this case Run sister run, this product I bought it for my sister, she had an accident where she can walk but she needs to use a cane, with this product my sister is able to workout her legs the proper way, she wear's this everyday and she says she feel like it's improving somehow, I'm happy that she said that, great work I will recommend this for people who just needs a work out or who uses a cane.
customer_reviews.author: Glayson

customer_reviews.title: Got the 20lb weights (10lbs each) They do a good job and I am happy with my purchase based ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the 20lb weights (10lbs each) They do a good job and I am happy with my purchase based on the affordable price. My only gripe was how thin the Velcro straps are. I wish they made the straps thicker so that they are more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: These work fine with one downside. If your not wearing long socks or pants these can run on your ankle the wrong way. I mostly wear short socks and prefer shorts when I’m exercising so it’s not my favorite. But I can just suck it up and deal with it. I’m not exercising all day so I guess it’s not that big a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dinguskon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and narrow
customer_reviews.text: These weights are comfortable. With an every other day routine, they have lasted over a month with no problems. They are thin enouth to be combined with other weights for higher weight combinations for different exercises. A great purchase for home PT or just staying in shape.
customer_reviews.author: K. DenyseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They seemed like a great idea at the time but these are not built to last. The materials are cheap and won’t stay in place, it moves around. I had a family emergency and was out of town for a month so they arrived when I was gone. What a disappointment. I wanted to return them the minute I opened the box. I had to keep them because it was too late.
customer_reviews.author: Karelys

customer_reviews.title: So far decent quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 10lb each set and wear to work. So far after month of wearing no tears or wear marks from being on top part of boots. Tho weight are bags, so sand does shift around a little bit in their pouches and working 10 hr day do need to readjust few times. If looking to use just as work out supplement will def be fine and last good while.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Good ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to close and fit to your ankles and not too heavy. Provides good weight in a soft cloth covering. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they're tight
customer_reviews.text: These work great as long as you tighten them and ensure the open area is not on the front of your foot. They've really helped me to build muscle after recent hip surgery. I am very happy I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Boo on these.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it's possible to find an ankle weight that DOESN'T leak it's black sprinkles all over the place. 5 months for these puppies. I wear them for 20 mins, about 4 to 5 times a week. I wear them while I do Tae Bo. I got them March 8th. Today (August 12th) they broke and sprinkled. Boo on these things. My search continues.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: Velcro strap is very thin and broke when I was applying it the 2nd time. Otherwise, as expected. You’ll need to adjust until there are no pressure points. I wore them for an 8 hour day that turned into 12 and had some small sore spots. The next day The a strap broke when i was snugging it up on my ankle, making it unusable. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unwearable
customer_reviews.text: I tried wearing these a few times, but they are just too uncomfortable no matter how you wear them and hurt after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Raena

customer_reviews.title: Gain Strength to Lift Feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I noticed that I was almost stumbling on very small elevations of pavement. I wear them during the day. I have already noticed that I pick up my feet better when they are not on. The 1 1/2 pound weight is good for starters.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon West

customer_reviews.title: Harder to put on but more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I don't like these is because it takes so long to put them on, and there isn't time when you are doing a workout. However, I do like it because they are sturdy and stay on even during stand up routines, and they are comfortable. My old pair of ankle weights jabbed me at certain areas.
customer_reviews.author: MNO505

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item to use for elbow / shoulder rehab and I'm very pleased. Received item in a timely fashion!
customer_reviews.author: The Lady

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great so far (I've had them a few weeks) no problems. I'm a small woman so I wear them all the way fastened and they fit well enough for my ground workouts, slightly loose but not enough to slip around or be uncomfortable! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wild-bio

customer_reviews.title: they do cause ankles to hurt pretty bad after wearing for longer than 5-10mins
customer_reviews.text: Received and it already had threads breaking loose.... Other than that they are ok. they do cause ankles to hurt pretty bad after wearing for longer than 5-10mins. Minimal workout, just walking back and forth..... (Update) one of the bags inside the weight busted open spilling sand like stuff everywhere.... It was a good product but not made well..... will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Gurttron

customer_reviews.title: I like em'
customer_reviews.text: Just got my order and the unit is comfortable but you cannot adjust the weight as I thought in some comments. I got the 2 1/2 lbs per ankle and that is the weight it must remain. The quality seems good and I will know more in a month or two at which point I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stone

customer_reviews.title: It comes in different weight sizes
customer_reviews.text: I walk everyday and sometimes I want to work a little harder. These weights are great. Fit around the ankle. Are not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Diana G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Easy to adjust. A must have!
customer_reviews.text: A little bulky, but live that I can adjust the weight from 1 to 5 lbs. Love this. I use on evening walks and around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie

customer_reviews.title: leg weights
customer_reviews.text: I like the material, the easy way to lose weight or gain weight and the Velcro fasteners. I don't like the way that the Velcro goes all the way to the end of the strap. It makes it hard to remove from the back of my leg because it holds flat.
customer_reviews.author: Dabldoo

customer_reviews.title: I love these adorable ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: I love these adorable ankle weights. They're easy to fit in my gym bag and I use them alllll the time. My legs look great and I'm so pleased with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: Correct Weight—Don't Smell Like Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: These actually are like the picture and description. They are the correct weight (1lb in my case). Oh, best of all, they don't have a chemical smell like some of the other brands I've purchased. That alone makes them a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Thorne HamstringTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hold my music stand down in windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got these.
customer_reviews.text: Am glad I got these. I have rather large ankles and was worried I'd not find adjustable ankle weights that would fit on my ankles but these do and with lots of room to spare. I also like the way you can add and remove the weighted bags under the velcro flap so you can start out slow and build your way up to the 6lbs each. Definitely a good add to my workout.
customer_reviews.author: SharkysWaters

customer_reviews.title: Adds an extra challenge to workout
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend much for ankle weights and I'm glad I got these ones because they are priced low and work great. I will probably get another pair that are heavier for harder workouts but these are perfect for floor Pilates or a hard yoga session. I haven't worn them running yet, but I imagine they would be a nice challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Solid ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: These ankle weights do their job pretty well. Now, my only issue (and it may be only preference) is that it’s kinda difficult to slide the sand bags back into the pockets. Besides that, they’re pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: I like the ankle weights as they get the job done, however you can't evenly split the weight into 1, 2, and 3 because there are 5 weight bags in each. This gives for uneven weight divisions, but overall it still gets the job and workout done.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Like It
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these once so far. I'd have to admit they were comfortable and did what they were supposed to...However, I was expecting them to feel thicker (material wise) and be slightly heavier.
customer_reviews.author: cckbella

customer_reviews.title: Straps literally tearing off after only 2 months use.
customer_reviews.text: After only 2 months, the straps are tearing. One strap literally tore off today. Very disappointed! I've had previous weights which lasted years instead of days.
customer_reviews.author: silverone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but read description more carefully than I did.
customer_reviews.text: They are excellent in construction and design. Unfortunately I misread product description. Three pounds per leg is half what I wanted and find I do in fact need. I'll see if I can still return and hopefully exchange.
customer_reviews.author: RiccardoM

customer_reviews.title: These weights were bot comfortable. They are also too big foe me that ...
customer_reviews.text: These weights were bot comfortable. They are also too big foe me that it moves around a lot. I do like that you can add weights and take out weights though.
customer_reviews.author: Van Lam

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These ankle weights are great! I love them. They fit sturdy on my ankles without movement. They are super secure and I don't feel like I have to keep refastening the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Extra Boost To Cardio and Str Training
customer_reviews.text: Great for stairmaster, step ups, lunges, and an extra kick added to ab workouts, been using for about a week or so, roughly 3 workouts. Solid product. I was worried that the weights would not be enough. Im 5 8 225 and hit the weights pretty heavy but these step up my cardio and strenth training workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: They are good, serve their purpose, just too big and bulky compared to others that I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Dayra Salazar

customer_reviews.title: strap up!!
customer_reviews.text: these are the best for wrist weights, I was having a conversation the other day with a coworker and he was telling me that he couldnt find any decent ankle/wrist weights around on the market i let him try these out and he love them just as much as i did he went ahead and bought a pair for his son
customer_reviews.author: Flex L.

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Agree with most other reviewers that the straps could be improved in getting a tighter fit. Other than that, it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: K. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a total knee replacement and needed to continue my therapy on my own. I needed the ankle weights to strengthen my knee and my legs. I use them as wrist weights during my power walks and when I get to the gym or home I use the weights for my knee and leg exercises. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: A lil itchy
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for a few hours around the house while I did chores and my legs were pretty sore the next day. My only complaint is that the Velcro always rubs against my skin making them uncomfortable to wear for too long before having to adjust them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Frederick

customer_reviews.title: and good price. I have the 1
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, and good price. I have the 1.5 pair and it is nice to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Feve Cariaga

customer_reviews.title: These have lasted for about 6 months and still are in great shape and do the job during an intense workout
customer_reviews.text: The Yes4All Comfort Fit ankle weights were purchased to replace another set of ankle weights that didn't last more than a week. These have lasted for about 6 months and still are in great shape and do the job during an intense workout. They are comfortable and easy to put on and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: 6thspence

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They feel pretty heavy at first
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They feel pretty heavy at first; however, once you've worn them for around 10 minutes, you don't notice them at all. I wear them to work and they don't bother me. Your legs may be sore during the first few days of use. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Davis

customer_reviews.title: Needed frequent adjustment for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with weights and I wore these on my ankles. They are not as comfortable as I hoped and rubbed my ankles somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: Paperdoll

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived earlier than expected and work very well! A great way to add extra weight and resistance to walking or jogging!
customer_reviews.author: Kinpa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use - a little big
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few adjustable ankle weight sets, and these are more comfortable than others I've used. I have small ankles, so they're still a little on the large side, but overall I'm satisfied with them - they're helping with my rehab, and are great to wear on exercise walks. If it weren't for my shoes, they'd fall off on the walks, but my athletic shoes hold them up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: patticake

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to put on/take off. You can secure them as tight as you need and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: the weights are very sturdy and seems that they are made very well
customer_reviews.text: the weights are very sturdy and seems that they are made very well, and the velcro on the straps are very tight which for me is very good when i use them for my exercises
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for leg exercises
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered these because I thought if I wore them all day, I would burn more calories. Then I discovered that you shouldn't do that because it's bad for your knees. That being said, I ended up using them while I do leg exercises. They are comfortable and help add resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Velcro is strong enough to hold it on my ankles although I'm not out walking with it. I use it to strengthen my muscles after knee surgery so I'm in a sitting position when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good design, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves 'em. Straps with Velcro closure make for easy removal and good position retention.
customer_reviews.author: Dave the Train Man

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They rub slightly but if you wear long socks its solved
customer_reviews.author: tyler dorr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to secure with Velcro band
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight for strengthening the meniscus in my knee with gentle exercises ordered by my chiropractor. Very easy to secure to ankle with velcro band. If you are looking for weights to build leg muscles, look for higher poundage in this style.
customer_reviews.author: J Cather Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for AB Workout!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ankle weights to use while doing AB workouts. Greats quality and is soft on my ankles! I have used these for about 3 weeks now and I don't have any complaints about them!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved them but But then they started to rip at the sides and now the sand comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Prizmaticx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as wrist weights but straps are not long enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as wrist weights but straps are not long enough for medium size ankles. Love the soft material and I use it with an elderly population with fragile skin. Heavier weights due have larger straps but wish they were longer so I could use them on people with ankle edema
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly was expected! Don't put them on in low ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly was expected! Don't put them on in low socks, with a low shoe back. The rubbing of he shoe back, and the weights pulled the sling right off my ankle. Only advice.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, soft material on the weights, nice strong velcro to hold the weights in place. Cleanly finished and look well-made - very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bunnyboy

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The velcro straps on these ankle weights lasted for less than 3 weeks before they fell apart. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JAL

customer_reviews.title: Poor adjustable fit
customer_reviews.text: I got the dark blue, 2.5lb weights. Too big and bulky (for reference, I'm 5'7, 130 lbs) and the straps cause chafing when I wear them around my ankles and wrists due to the poor adjustable fit. My brother (6'2, 230 lbs) has the same issue with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good gift and very easy to use. love the packaging - came in on time too
customer_reviews.author: Darlene T. Nutley

customer_reviews.title: almost like it was perforated at the seam
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these weights. After my first use, one of the metal connectors fell off, almost like it was perforated at the seam. I have only had the product for a week and am down to one weight, pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These shipped fast and are easy to use. I recommend wearing over pants or socks because the metal clasp that holds the velcro strap can dig into your ankle after a while. I got these after after getting cleared to do physical therapy at home and they have done the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great condition
customer_reviews.text: One of the clasp/buckles had rust on it. Like it was used or old. Kind of strange. It still works but I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackee

customer_reviews.title: Good set of ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: Soft, nice, comfortable. Price is reasonable. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: L & F

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Longer straps with velcro fit large ankles easily. You can also REMOVE weight from each one as the weight bags are in 5 pockets secured by velcro. Just remove equal amount from each side and build up to the 3 pound instead of having to purchase another lighter or heavier set of weights.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Moreno

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase of these weights
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase of these weights. You can take out some of the weight to make them lighter. The only down fall is sometimes the fabric pricks at my skin if I don't have clothing on underneath them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my umbrella stroller. If I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my umbrella stroller. If I had a diaper bag or anything on the stroller, it would tip over as soon as I pulled my baby out. Putting one weight in each leg, quickly stopped that problem!
customer_reviews.author: Lana M

customer_reviews.title: Ankle weights.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and what my physical therapist suggested. Good value for the money, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Esma Vance

customer_reviews.title: Ankle/Wrist Weights
customer_reviews.text: I use them on my ankles. Work very well and the weight is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: TR_LA

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were not comfortable and cause bad chaffing on my wife's ankles. They were returned
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gray

customer_reviews.title: Don’t seem like they’d last very long I have the 10 pound ...
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. Can’t get a tight enough fit without them slipping. Don’t seem like they’d last very long I have the 10 pound per leg version.
customer_reviews.author: carole

customer_reviews.title: Adds good weight to my legs when I work out
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room to adjust for ankles. Adds good weight to my legs when I work out.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I use the set for my ankles mainly, great quality , does the job done. I like the fact that I can add/remove the weights.
customer_reviews.author: Reza

customer_reviews.title: weights are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: If you wear low cut socks, ankle straps cut into the skin. To remedy problem, you need to cut top halves of high cut socks and slip them over the lower ankle to cushion the straps. Other than this problem, weights are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Allen andrews

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: My family have been used the product for one year. It is great. Comfortable, and easy to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Huatao Weng

customer_reviews.title: just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed to use for sitting at my desk. leg lifts in my chair with a little added weight.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Cole

customer_reviews.title: not really worth it especially if small ankles
customer_reviews.text: uncomfortable and felt weird if u took a pound out
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I showed these to my physical therapist and he was ...
customer_reviews.text: I showed these to my physical therapist and he was impressed with them. I plan to use them in my leg strengthening exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ray

customer_reviews.title: love these! i use them all the time on ...
customer_reviews.text: love these! i use them all the time on ankles and wrists. they've held up well so far but the light color shows dirt.
customer_reviews.author: t4ea

customer_reviews.title: but I still love them. Great for walking
customer_reviews.text: These are bulkier, than I expected, but I still love them. Great for walking, kick backs, and lunges.
customer_reviews.author: Keshia cook

customer_reviews.title: Trouble staying fastened
customer_reviews.text: The appearance and weight is very nice. The Velcro is not. It doesn't want to stay fastened. I got a 1lb set identical to these for my son to wear for therapy. Same Velcro problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Big but useful
customer_reviews.text: A little bulkier than I thought but what can you expect for a 10 weight.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: Velcro straps suck!
customer_reviews.text: Velcro straps don't hold up for sh-t. After only using them a handful of times one Velcro strap ripped in half.
customer_reviews.author: Jadah

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! The Velcro is a little itchy so I wear longer socks or leggings! I love wearing these for walks and in the house I have two story’s so the stairs are a workout alone
customer_reviews.author: Vchampagne

customer_reviews.title: Stay home mom with a newborn and I wear these ...
customer_reviews.text: Stay home mom with a newborn and I wear these when doing chores or taking baby for walks for my work outs. Gives ya just enough for a light resistance level.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: New. As shown. Exactly what it says. Slight smell that goes away. Professionally made
customer_reviews.author: Peter A

customer_reviews.title: nice ankle weights for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I just love these ankle weights I love working out at hom so I like to wear these to add a little wait to some of my workouts and i can say I'm very satisfied with these weights
customer_reviews.author: LaRay

product_meta.title: Yes4All Comfort Fit Ankle/Wrist Weights (Set of 2) – Multi Weight & Color Available
product_meta.description:
ANKLE WEIGHTS FOR YOUR LIFE

Yes4All serves you the best with TWO different kinds of Ankle Weights

Non-removable Ankle Weights are covered with soft elastic Neoprene fabric providing the best comfort to your skin while absorbing moisture and sweat quickly. They also come with adjustable Velcro band to ensure a customized fit to your ankles, thus prevent bouncing during practice.
Ankle Weights with removable weights are covered with Nylon fabric for comfort and durability. The ankle weight comes with a metal D-ring and an adjustable Velcro band to allow a comfortable and snug fit.
WEIGHT FUNCTION FOR MASSIVE BENEFITS 
INCREASE OUTPUT: Enhance the variety of exercises and help you to step up your workout routine.
VERSATILE: You can corporate this ankle weights into your daily exercises like Running, Leg lifts, Bicycle Crunches, Leg Extension, Pull ups, Aerobic and many more. Or use them for physical therapy, home workouts, walking, jogging, core training, CrossFit, aerobics, gym and many more.
MULTI USE: Can be attached to ankles, wrists for maximum performance.

VARIETY WEIGHTS AVAILABLE FOR DIFFERENT LEVEL WORKOUT

Neoprene Ankle Weight
Grey – 1 lb. Each (2 LBS TOTAL)
Lime Green – 1.5 lbs. Each (3 LBS TOTAL) 
Light Blue –2 lbs. Each (4 LBS TOTAL) 
Dark Blue – 2.5 lbs. Each (5 LBS TOTAL) 

Adjustable Ankle Weights: 
Black – 3 lbs. Each (6LBS TOTAL) 

Warning: 
Be careful and consult doctors if you have frequent lower body pain during exercise.
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE WEIGHTS DESIGNED FOR COMFORT AND DURABILITY: Ankle/Wrist Weights are made of nylon fabric exterior, reinforced stitching and sturdy outer trim with 5 external pockets, removable iron sand weights for easy adjustment for each side
PACKAGE INCLUDES: A pair of 20 lbs Ankle Weights (10 lbs each). Dimension: 14.5” x 8”. Color: Black
ADJUSTABLE WEIGHTS: Designed with 5 external pockets, removable iron sand weights for adjustment from 2 to 10 lbs for each side
PERFECT FOR FITNESS, HEALTH AND WELLNESS: Increase lower body strength, rehabilitate muscles, improve balance, and coordination

GREAT FOR ANYONE: Portable and lightweight. Can be used by women & men, seniors and kids. For physical therapy, home workouts, walking, jogging, core training, CrossFit, aerobics, gym and many other fitness exercises
